scripts.reset: pnpm run clean && pnpm run setup
scripts.dev: pnpm run copy && cd dev && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:lib: pnpm run copy && cd dev && pnpm run dev:lib
scripts.dev:mui: pnpm run copy:uni && cd packages/mui && pnpm run dev
scripts.build: pnpm run copy && pnpm run copy:uni && lerna run --no-private build && node scripts/mui.mjs
scripts.build:dev: pnpm run copy && cd dev && pnpm run build
scripts.build:example: pnpm run copy && pnpm run copy && pnpm --filter @vtj/ide build:example
scripts.build:mui: pnpm run copy:uni && pnpm --filter @vtj/mui build && node scripts/mui.mjs
scripts.release:test: lerna publish from-package --dist-tag test --no-private --yes && pnpm run sync
scripts.release:prod: lerna publish from-package --force-publish --no-private --yes && pnpm run sync
scripts.publish:test: pnpm run setup && lerna version prerelease --yes && pnpm run release:test
scripts.publish:prepatch: pnpm run setup && lerna version prepatch --yes && pnpm run release:test
scripts.publish:preminor: pnpm run setup && lerna version preminor --yes && pnpm run release:test
scripts.publish:premajor: pnpm run setup && lerna version premajor --yes && pnpm run release:test
scripts.publish:prod: pnpm run setup && pnpm run ci:update && lerna version patch --yes && pnpm run release:prod
scripts.ci:update: git add . && git commit -m "ci update files" && git push
